meanings.definition: To show or display something for others to see.
meanings.sent1: The artist was exhibiting her paintings at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The zoo was exhibiting a rare species of bird.
meanings.sent3: The cat was exhibiting its hunting skills by catching a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun was exhibiting its full glory as it set over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was exhibiting a dazzling array of colors in the night sky.

meanings.definition: To demonstrate a particular quality or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The student was exhibiting excellent manners during the school assembly.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was exhibiting great sportsmanship on the field.
meanings.sent3: The robot was exhibiting a sense of humor by telling a joke.
meanings.sent4: The storm was exhibiting its power with strong winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The flower was exhibiting its beauty with vibrant colors and a sweet fragrance.

meanings.definition: To present or put on display in a public setting.
meanings.sent1: The museum was exhibiting ancient artifacts from Egypt.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer was exhibiting their latest collection on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The chef was exhibiting culinary skills by preparing a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: The magician was exhibiting tricks that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The science fair was exhibiting innovative projects created by students.
